X5 GRANDITALIA C11 BREAK


   
Faema's newest arrival on the North American market !
 
For over half a century, Faema has used technological innovations in building commercial espresso equipment in its strive to expand the culture of Italian espresso coffee throughout the world.

Today, with its modern design and elegance, the X5 Granditalia expresses the ideal combination of superior espresso tradition along with the most advanced technology available. Its special care of ergonomic details, the consistency of quality beverage along with its extreme ease of use are only a few of the advantageous qualities of the X5 Granditalia.

The X5 Granditalia BREAK has been designed for self-service, that is, a customer can prepare a cup of espresso, cappuccino, café au lait by himself with the simple touch of one button. The choice of the different beverages available are made simple by the clear images and descriptions above each selection button.
   
Specifications
  • for self-service use
  • automatically brews perfect espresso, cappuccino, latté etc. with the simple touch of a button
  • 4 groups mounted on a rotary disc for impeccable coffee without operator intervention
  • possibility of 7 selections each individually programmable to set the dose of coffee, milk and hot water, the type of coffee blend, grind and infusion time
  • a double coffee dosing grinder for whole beans allow you to use 2 different blends of coffee: the logical solution to the diverse taste preference of your customers
  • only the quantity of coffee actually needed is ground to maintain coffee freshness
  • equipped with Frigomilk to maintain fresh milk cold
  • the coffee delivery spout is easily adjustable for different cup sizes to meet the customers' varying requirements
  • fully automated end of day cleaning cycle
  • dry ground disposal in an incorporated drawer
  • fully computerized system for its programmable stage with magnetic key
   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
Capacity of coffee bean container  2.6 kg.
Coffee output per hr.  240 cups
Cappuccino output per hr.  160 cups
Hot water output per hr.  240 cups (100 cc/cup)
Voltage  208/22OV, 50/60 Hz
 single & three phase
Absorption  610OW
Dimensions (mm)
*with feet 		 WXDXH
 500 X 640 X 800
Weight  87 kg.
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
